post_text: Summer update from Metro Arts Spanish teacher Ivy Worsham ‚ÄúI‚Äôve been spending time this summer with family and friends in Colorado and Tennessee, getting in lots of hikes and wildlife viewing in both the Rocky Mountains and the Smokey Mountains, I've learned a lot from museum tours in Denver, Knoxville, and Nashville, and I've especially enjoyed Navitat, which is a ropes course high up in the trees of a nature preserve in Knoxville, TN.
